en: A false balance is an abomination to Jehovah; But a just weight is his delight.
hmr: Bûkna indik naw chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a nih; Inkhîna indik ruok chu a lâwm zâwng a nih.

en: When pride cometh, then cometh shame; But with the lowly is wisdom.
hmr: Chapona chu a hung pha chun, inzaknain a hung zui; Varna ruok chu inngaitlâwmhai kuomah a um.

en: The integrity of the upright shall guide them; But the perverseness of the treacherous shall destroy them.
hmr: Mi tluong chu a lungril indiktak chun ṭhuoi a ta, Bawsetuhai ruok chu an khêl- inhlipnain anni suksieng a tih.

en: Riches profit not in the day of wrath; But righteousness delivereth from death.
hmr: Lungsen nia chun hausakna chu a ṭhahnem chuong nawh a, Felna ruok chun thinaa inthawkin a sansuok.

en: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way; But the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.
hmr: Mi fel famkim chu a felna chun a lampui kâwkhmûng a ta, Mi khawhlo ruok chu a khawhlonaa ngei chun tlu lem a tih.

en: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them; But the treacherous shall be taken in their own iniquity.
hmr: Mi tluong chu an felna chun anni sansuok a ta, Ringmawumtaka thawtuhai ruok chu an thil sukpawi ngei chun anni lâng a tih.

en: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish; And the hope of iniquity perisheth.
hmr: Mi khawhlo chu a thi chun, a beiseina chu bohmang a tih, Mi fel naw beiseina chu bohmang bawk a tih.

en: The righteous is delivered out of trouble; And the wicked cometh in his stead.
hmr: Mi fel chu buoinaa inthawk san suokin a um a, A hmuna chun mi khawhlo chu a lût hlak.

en: With his mouth the godless man destroyeth his neighbor; But through knowledge shall the righteous be delivered.
hmr: Pathien ngaisak naw mi chun a bauin a tuolbâwm chu a suksiet a, Mi fel ruok chu hrietna leia sanhim a nih.

en: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth; And when the wicked perish, there is shouting.
hmr: Mi fel le ṭhataka a khawsak sûng po, khawpui chu a hlim hlak, Chun, mi khawhlo chu a bohmang pha chun khêkri a um hlak.

en: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted; But it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.
hmr: Mi tluong malsâwmna leiin khawpui chu chawimawiin a um a, Nisienlakhawm, mi khawhlo baua pei thlâkin a um hlak.

en: He that despiseth his neighbor is void of wisdom; But a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
hmr: A tuolbâwm ngainêptu chu varna bo a nih, Mi hrietthiemna nei mi ruok chu a to ṭawk ṭawk.

en: He that goeth about as a tale-bearer revealeth secrets; But he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth a matter.
hmr: Mi lâwt vêltu anga invâk vêl chun thurûk a phawr hlak a, Mi lungril ringumtak ruok chun thu chu a ip hlak.

en: Where no wise guidance is, the people falleth; But in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
hmr: Inṭhuoina var um nawnaa chun mi an tlu hlak a, Thurâwntu tamtakhai lai ruok chun himna a um.

en: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it; But he that hateth suretyship is secure.
hmr: Hmêlmak mi ta dinga aiawtu ni chu kawisieng a ta, Aiawtu nina theidatu ruok chu nghet lem a tih.

en: A gracious woman obtaineth honor; And violent men obtain riches.
hmr: Nuhmei zângaithei chun inzâumna a kawl zing a, Pasal kâwlhrâwng chun hausaknahai a kawl hlak.

en: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul; But he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.
hmr: Mi zainêmtak chun a lungril ta ding ngeiin thil ṭha a thawh a, Mi rilo ruok chun ama tisa ngei a sukbuoi.

en: The wicked earneth deceitful wages; But he that soweth righteousness hath a sure reward.
hmr: Mi khawhlo chun hlaw hmusit- umtakhai chu a hlawh a, Felna tutu ruok chun lâwmman indiktak chu a hmuh.

en: He that is stedfast in righteousness shall attain unto life; And he that pursueth evil doeth it to his own death.
hmr: Felnaa ngîr det tlattu chun hringna chu hmûng a ta, Suolna hnawttu chun a thina ding ngeiin a thaw a nih.

en: They that are perverse in heart are an abomination to Jehovah; But such as are perfect in their way are his delight.
hmr: Lungrila khêlinhliphai chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum an na, An lampuia fel famkimhai ruok chu a lâwm zâwng an nih.

en: Though hand join in hand, the evil man shall not be unpunished; But the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.
hmr: Mi rilo chu hrem naw ni naw ni, Mi fel thla ruok chu sanhim nîng a tih.

en: As a ring of gold in a swine’s snout, So is a fair woman that is without discretion.
hmr: Nuhmei hmêlṭha ngairuotthiemna neilo chu, Vawkpui hnâra rângkachak kutsebi ang a nih.

en: The desire of the righteous is only good; But the expectation of the wicked is wrath.
hmr: Mi fel dit zâwng chu thil ṭha chau a nih, Mi rilo beiseina chu lungsenna chau a nih.

en: There is that scattereth, and increaseth yet more; And there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth only to want.
hmr: Semdar raka pung deu deu si a um a, Mamaw tâwk bâk inro tlata tlasam si a um bawk a.

en: The liberal soul shall be made fat; And he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
hmr: Mi tiktlai chu sukthâu nîng a ta, Tui buoktu chu, ama ngei khawm tui buokkhum nîng a tih.

en: He that withholdeth grain, the people shall curse him; But blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.
hmr: Bu inrotu chu miin ṭawngsie inphur an tih, A zawrtu lu chunga ruok chun malsâwmna um lem a tih.

en: He that diligently seeketh good seeketh favor; But he that searcheth after evil, it shall come unto him.
hmr: Thil ṭha nguntaka zawngtu chun ditsakna a zawng a nih, Pawitâwkna zawngtu chunga ruok chun pawitâwkna chu tlung a tih.

en: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall; But the righteous shall flourish as the green leaf.
hmr: A hausaknahai ring mi chu tlûng a ta, Mi fel ruok chu hna hring angin inno a tih.

en: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind; And the foolish shall be servant to the wise of heart.
hmr: Mi ama in ngei sukbuoitu chun takbo ro hluong a ta, Mi invêt chu lungril var kuoma siehlaw nîng a tih.

en: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; And he that is wise winneth souls.
hmr: Mi fel ra chu hringna thingkûng a na, Lungrilhai latu chu mi var a nih.

en: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth; How much more the wicked and the sinner!
hmr: Ngai ta, mi fel chu hnuoia hin thung nîng a ta, Mi suol le mi khawhlohai khawm chu thung an va ni nasa awm de!
